captions.text: My favorite champion is Amumu.
Come play with me.
Amumu can change team fights hugely.
The aspect of flashing onto an entire team is what drew me to Amumu.
I press ‘F’ key and I press ‘R’ and a team fight is completely changed. You’ve caught five people off guard instantly.
When I’m playing Amumu, I like to have, uh, Froggen, for example… something that can AOE burst the whole team.
Whether it’s Brand, whether it’s Annie; with Amumu synergy, the burst damage is quite important.
In season one, I was 1v5 pretty much, and they were all pretty low after a team fight,
and I just flashed over, steal the Baron, ult all five of them, killed three of them before I died and stole Baron as well.  It was awesome.
I just decided to, like, have fun in solo queue once with Amumu,
and decided to buy things like Death Cap and Zhonya’s Hourglass and it was just like one shottin’ people with your ultimate.
The ratio on his ultimate is really really good.
If you just build him flat AP, you’re really squishy, but you can catch people off guard.
Let me give you a hug!
Awww… okay.
Especially if you’re jungling Amumu, be very careful in your early game
if they can invade on you, and if you get stronger junglers like Shaco, or your Shyvanas and Mundos - if they come into the jungle and try and take you on, you have to be really careful.
It’s just a patience game with Amumu, you really want to wait until the mid-game and late-game, when team composition plays an important part of the game.
Amumu can start team fights, disengage team fights,
And just, if you flash-ultimate in a team fight, you can clearly see what you’ve done in that team fight, you’ve caught five people offguard.
He plays a vital role in team comps.
I really like to be involved in a team fight.  I like to have done something and have something to show for it.
My name is Stephen Ellis.
I’m Snoopeh from Counter Logic Gaming Europe, and my favorite champion is Amumu.

title: Pro Player Pick: Snoopeh Picks Amumu
